```

```{r survfits1, fig.cap=" Observed survey biomass index (points), estimated survey biomass (lines), and asymptotic 95% confidence intervals (vertical lines and transparent ribbons), for the proposed 2022 model (green) and the accepted 2017 model (black). knitr::include_graphics(here('figs','3_cpue_compare.png'))
```



```{r ssbcompare, fig.cap=" Time series of spawning biomass for the accepted 2017 model and proposed 2022 model (the same as the 2017 model, with updated data).", eval = T}

```

```{r reccompare, fig.cap=" Time series of age-0 recruits for the accepted 2017 model and proposed 2022 model (the same as the 2017 model, with updated data and end years for the bias adjustment ramp).", eval = T}

```

```{r selex, fig.cap="Sex-specific age selectivity curves by fleet (panels) for the accepted 2017 model (black lines) and proposed 2022 model (green lines. Male selectivity curves are dashed; female curves are solid.", eval = T}
